Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends a payment in lieu of taxes for Lido Beach in the town of Hempstead
Summary: Extends the expiration of payments in lieu of taxes for Lido Beach in the town of Hempstead until June 30, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 676 of the laws of 1978, amending the town law relating to payment in lieu of taxes for certain property in the town of Hempstead, in relation to extending the expiration thereof
